title: South Carolina Board of Chiropractic Examiners
description: The SC Board of Chiropractic Examiners licenses and regulates Chiropractors and the practice of chiropractic in the state of South Carolina. SC LLR can assist you with examination information, continuing education requirements, licensure applications, renewals, and board information.
cleaned_text: The SC Board of Chiropractic Examiners licenses and regulates Chiropractors and the practice of chiropractic in the state of South Carolina. SC LLR can assist you with examination information, continuing education requirements, licensure applications, renewals, and board information. Disclaimer of Liability With respect to any information found on this website, neither the Department of Labor, Licensing and Regulation or any of its employees, makes any warranty, express or implied, including the warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose, or assumes any legal liability or responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information, apparatus, product, or process disclosed, or represents that its use would not infringe privately owned rights.
